SAINT.Name: Hieromartyr Anthimus, Bishop of Nicomedia, and those with him: Theophilus the Deacon, Dorotheus, Mardonius, Migdonius, Peter, Indis, Gorgonius, Xeno, Domna the Virgin and Euthimius (+302)
St. Phoebe the Deaconess at Cenchreae (1st C)
St Anastasius I, Patriarch of Jerusalem
Blessed John 'the Hairy' and Fool-For-Christ at Rostov (+1580)
New Hieromartyr Pimen, bishop of Vernyi (+1918)
